content:
I ran into some behavior that confused me where, I have a directory in my repo .cargo/config.toml which specifies some info about using an alternate crate index/registry. In an environment where github was blocked, I ran into errors running cargo generate-lockfile --manifest-path=${MANIFEST}. The thing that seemed to resolve the issue was first changing directories to my workspace and then running Cargo.

Does Cargo use CWD when looking for config files or --manifest-path?
It uses the CWD and searches up from there.
That feels kinda incorrect. If I'm in workspace A and end up building something in workspace B using --manifest-path wouldn't the correct config files to use be the ones in workspace B?
Friendly ping here, just wanna know if I should open an issue or not :D
It's a known point of confusion. https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/9769 tracks this and other considerations.
